definition: any triangular fore-and-aft sail (set forward of the foremast), shift from one side of the ship to the other
details:
noun
- any triangular fore-and-aft sail (set forward of the foremast)
verb
- shift from one side of the ship to the other
= example: shift from one side of the ship to the other
= synonyms: jibe, gybe, change course
- refuse to comply
= synonyms: balk
